If your tracker's serial output is only random symbols, you can find potential fixes at https://docs.slimevr.dev/common-issues.html#the-wifi-settings-window-outputs-symbols-and-nothing-else.

faqs.answer: If you are having trouble with your aux tracker(s) (more commonly referred to as "tracker extensions"), you can find potential fixes at https://docs.slimevr.dev/common-issues.html#my-aux-tracker-isnt-working.
If you are getting a "Sensor was reset error" on your tracker's serial logs, you can find potential fixes at https://docs.slimevr.dev/common-issues.html#sensor-was-reset-error.

If your trackers are connected to WiFi but are not showing up on the SlimeVR server, you can find potential fixes at https://docs.slimevr.dev/common-issues.html#the-trackers-are-connected-to-my-wifi-but-dont-turn-up-on-slimevr.

faqs.answer: If your trackers are drifting excessively, you can find potential fixes at https://docs.slimevr.dev/common-issues.html#your-trackers-are-drifting-more-than-expected.

faqs.answer: It's not recommended to use 3 trackers. If you use 3 trackers, you won't be able to bend your legs (commonly referred to as "Minecraft" legs). You can see a demonstration of different combinations of trackers in ZRock's video at https://youtu.be/iKmrNKLacwk. You can find more information about how many trackers you need at https://docs.slimevr.dev/slimevr101.html#how-many-trackers-do-you-need.

faqs.answer: You can find the SlimeVR documentation at https://docs.slimevr.dev/. The documentation gives thorough information on what SlimeVR is, how to get it, how to use it, and more.

faqs.answer: **__Don't__** buy trackers from Amazon. Buying trackers from Amazon is not recommended as there have been many reports of faulty trackers from Amazon. You can check in the [#amazon-trackers](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/986713204656857138) channel on the SlimeVR Discord for more information.
matched_questions: are the amazon trackers ok to buy?
should I buy trackers from amazon or will they suck?

faqs.answer: If you're having trouble connecting your trackers with the serial monitor, you may have unofficial trackers from Amazon. If so, it's recommended that you just return them, otherwise if you really want to try to make them work, you can check in the [#amazon-trackers](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/986713204656857138) channel on the SlimeVR Discord for more information.

faqs.answer: It's possible that you don't have the required WebView2 component installed. You can download the WebView2 installer from here, make sure to specifically run it as an administrator (right click, then click "Run as administrator") otherwise it may not work: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/webview2/consumer/.
